"Hold your device steady.
Try to avoid shadows or glare on the barcode.
The barcode will be read automatically. A beep will sound when the scan is complete.
If the barcode appears blurry, try moving your device closer or further away until it comes into focus."
Barcodes supported by the Amazon App include UPC and EAN. Barcodes which are not currently supported may not scan successfully.
A couple of tips to get you started:
Hold your device in landscape mode. Centre the barcode so that fits inside the orange rectangle.
If there are two barcodes, position the barcode in the viewfinder as shown below:

Your Shopping Cart lives to serve. Give it purpose--fill it with books, CDs, videos, DVDs, toys, electronics, and more.

If you'd like to buy one--or more--now, just select the Move to Cart button next to the item(s) you're ready to buy."

Please do not remove the following ID, we are using it to help us debug problems: %1$s. Sincerely, the Amazon Mobile Shopping Team.

"To find an item, enter your search term in the Search box on the Home page or select Search from the device Menu.
To view items within a specific category, select \"All Departments\" at the top of the search results screen and choose a department."

"Once you find an item you wish to buy, you may purchase it by selecting either the Buy Now or Add to Cart button near the bottom of that item's screen.
If you are not currently signed in from your mobile device, you will be prompted to enter the e-mail address and password associated with your Amazon.in account in order to complete your purchase.
Please Note: Items placed in your cart will also be visible on the Amazon.in website and vice versa."

"You can pay for your orders using Visa and MasterCard debit or credit cards and Maestro debit cards issued by Citibank and State Bank of India.
You can also pay using Cash on Delivery. When you select Cash on Delivery as your payment method, you pay for your order only when you receive it.
The payment option of Cash on Delivery is available only for orders Fulfilled by Amazon. Seller fulfilled orders are not eligible for Cash on Delivery.
Cash on Delivery can be used as payment method only for orders which are less than Rs. 50,000. The order value limit could be lower depending on the pin code of your address.
Convenience fees of Rs. 39 will be charged on orders placed using Cash on Delivery. However, for a limited period, no convenience fees will be charged on any orders placed using Cash on delivery.
The order amount has to be paid in full before receiving the package and signing the delivery sheet. The package can be opened only after the payment is made.
"

"To view items placed in your shopping cart from your mobile device or computer, select Cart from the Home page or device Menu.
To purchase the items in your cart, select the Checkout button at the top or bottom of the Cart screen. To delete, edit quantities, or move items in your cart, highlight the item and select your desired option."

"To view items in any of your Wish Lists, select Wish List from More in the device Menu . If you have more than one Wish List, you may choose which one to view from the top of the Wish List page.
To delete items in your Wish List, highlight the item and select More options.
Please Note: Items placed in your Wish List will also be visible on the Amazon.in website and vice versa."

"1–Click ordering makes buying from Amazon.in on your mobile device fast and easy.
Turning on Mobile 1–Click allows you to skip the shopping cart and the checkout process. You simply select the Buy now with 1–Click button on any product page and have your order automatically charged to the default payment method on your account and dispatched to the default address.
To turn Mobile 1–Click on or off from your mobile device, select Your Account from the Home page or device Menu, choose View or Change 1–Click Settings, and follow the instructions. You may also turn off Mobile 1–Click from your computer via Your Account | View or change your 1–Click Settings."

"You can add a new delivery or invoice address during the checkout process by manually entering the address or selecting an existing one from your Amazon Address Book.
Please Note: As on the PC site, if you enter a new delivery address during the checkout process, you will be prompted to also provide your credit card information in order to confirm your identity."
You can make your gift festive with gift-wrap and a free gift note to be included on the packing slip.

"You may cancel your order for any item Fulfilled by Amazon, provided that the order has not yet entered the shipping process. To cancel an order immediately after placing it on your mobile device, select Cancel This Order Now on the Thank You page. You may also cancel items or orders placed from your device by selecting Your Account from the device menu, then View or Cancel Items/Orders.
If the item you want to cancel has already entered the shipping process, it cannot be cancelled by you or by our customer service department. However, you can return the item for a refund.
To request cancellation of an order that contains seller fulfilled items, please contact your respective seller."

"If you place multiple mobile orders for items sold by Amazon.in within 30 minutes, we will combine the orders into as few deliveries as possible to reduce delivery costs.
Please Note: Orders placed through Amazon Marketplace, Amazon Merchants, or other third-party sellers cannot be combined."
To view the status of recent orders, select Your Account from the device menu, then select View/Cancel Items or Orders.

"You can return items that you no longer want/ need or those that arrive damaged/defective for a full refund.
You can return items from Books and Movies & TV categories for refunds within 30 days of receipt of package, if they are damaged or defective. You can also return items you no longer want or need within 7 days of receipt of package.
You can return Electronics within 10 days if they are damaged/ defective or you no longer want/ need them.
"

"Fulfilled by Amazon indicates that the items are stored, packed and shipped by Amazon. Items Fulfilled by Amazon are indicated by the message Fulfilled by Amazon on the product details page.
Orders containing items Fulfilled by Amazon worth Rs. 499 or more are eligible for FREE delivery.For orders less than Rs. 499, you'll be charged Rs. 49 per package for delivery.However, for a limited period, delivery is FREE for all items Fulfilled by Amazon."
To view the delivery status of recent orders, select Your Account from the device menu, then select Your Orders to see the tracking information of your order.

We want you to shop with confidence anytime you purchase products on the Amazon.in website. That is why we guarantee purchases from sellers when payment is made via the Amazon.in website. The condition of the item you buy and its timely delivery are guaranteed under the Amazon A-to-Z Guarantee.
To access Your Account, first sign in from the Sign In area on the Home page. Once you are signed in, select Your Account from the device Menu.

"If you have forgotten your Amazon.in password, select the Forgot Your Password? button on the Sign In page and follow the instructions for entering the e-mail address associated with your Amazon.in account. We'll e-mail you a link to a page where you can create a new password"

"Amazon Prime customers can take advantage of all Prime delivery options when ordering from mobile devices. Prime customers receive free One-Day delivery on millions of Prime-eligible items and the opportunity to upgrade to Express delivery (before 1pm) for just £4.40 per item and Evening delivery to London and Birmingham for £7.34 per item.
Prime also offers special weekend and other delivery options for qualifying merchandise. Amazon Prime offers Free First Class delivery for Amazon Prime eligible items not available for One-Day, Express or Evening accelerated delivery.
Amazon Prime members are entitled to free One-Day delivery on all items marked as Amazon Prime eligible delivered to India Locations and free First Class delivery on all items marked as Amazon Prime eligible delivered to all Other India Locations (portions of Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland, Isles (including Shetlands, Isle of Man, Jersey and Guernsey), Cornwall, Northumberland, PO Boxes and BFPO addresses).
To take full advantage of your Amazon Prime membership, please go to Amazon.in from your computer and ensure that your default delivery method is set to One-Day.
Not yet a Prime member? Sign up for a new Prime membership by visiting Your Account on Amazon.in from your computer."
Do you have comments or suggestions about this application?

"Manufacturers sometimes ask that retailers not display a price if it drops below a certain amount. The \"Show Price\" message indicates that the price of the item is so low that the manufacturer requested that it not be advertised (that is, displayed). In a brick-and-mortar store, you would probably have to ask a salesperson what the price of the product is.
At Amazon, by selecting \"Show Price\" you are essentially asking to see the price, at which point we show it to you."
Are you sure to exit Amazon?

Do you really want to delete all the item(s)?

"Credit and debit cards are the only forms of payment that can be used for Subscribe & Save orders. However, to the extent applicable, we'll apply credit balances already on your account from Amazon.in gift cards and eligible promotional codes before charging the remaining balance to your debit/credit card.
You pay for subscription items only as they are shipped. For each shipment, we will charge your credit card for the price of the item at the time the shipment is processed less the Subscribe & Save discount, plus any applicable sales tax."

"To manage your subscriptions (e.g., cancel or skip subscriptions, request an extra delivery) select \"More\" from the Amazon App's Menu, and then select \"Your Subscribe & Save Items.\" If you have multiple addresses, you can select \"Change\" on the top row of the Your Subscribe & Save items page to select the shipping address associated with the subscription you want to view. You'll then be able to view and modify the subscriptions listed under the selected shipping address."

"Thank you for reporting a mismatch. Please submit this email and we will review to improve our match rate moving forward.
"

The address and payment method you choose will become your default shipping address and payment method for all 1–Click orders on the web or mobile. To add new address or payment method, please visit Amazon.in from your browser.

"When you enable 1–Click ordering on Amazon Mobile, you will be able to purchase items from your mobile device with the click of only one button. You won't be required to sign in every time you make a purchase on Amazon Mobile.

Mobile 1–Click on your phone is a separate feature from the 1–Click feature you use from your computer. Each setting may be turned on or off independent of the other. However, your default address and payment methods are the same for both Mobile 1–Click and the 1–Click feature you use with your computer.

Mobile 1–Click may only be turned on from your mobile device. Your Mobile 1–Click settings are only viewable from your PC if you have Mobile 1–Click activated.

You can turn off Mobile 1–Click from the Your Account feature on either your mobile device or your computer."

No applications can perform this action.

"For items Fulfilled by Amazon, based on the pincode of your address, you will receive the order in either 2-4 Business Days or 5-10 Business Days.
For seller fulfilled items, delivery speeds vary from 2-4 and 4-7 business days for urban areas, while for rural areas the shipping speed is 5-14 business days."
